messages.message:
@avi, @Balaram - for this Streaming API -
• Can we share the example script with a customer?
• If not, what information can we provide related to how they would integrate with the API?
• Does it follow the same authentication / security related details as with the Converse API (documented within AI Hub)?

• We can share the script with the customer, but we should make it clear that it is only unofficially supported. This means that they may need some guidance from us to integrate it and we may have breaking changes. It's good for a POC, but if they are planning to deploy to production, we should likely implement an official API for them. 
• It does follow the same bearer token based auth/security as the converse API.
@Tom Murphy are we close to starting a POC with them? If there is a committed deal happening - we will prioritise an official API to access multistep and also to get provenance info
